item.title: 郭明錤：小米 17 系列出货量下调 20%，标准版需求远低于预期
item.guid: 郭明錤：小米-17-系列出货量下调-20%，标准版需求远低于预期
item.description:
Renowned analyst Ming-Chi Kuo posted on X yesterday, stating that the total shipments of Xiaomi's new Xiaomi 17 series have been significantly lowered by about 20%, from the original target of approximately 10 million units to less than 8 million units, which may be lower than the previous 15 series. 知名分析师郭明錤昨天在 X 上发表帖文称，小米新款 Xiaomi 17 系列总出货量显著下调约 20%，由原先目标约 1,000 万部降至不足 800 万部，恐低于前代 15 系列水平。

    Reasons for the reduction: Demand for the 17 standard version was much lower than expected, originally estimated to account for 50% – 55%, but actually only about 15% – 20%. Although Pro and Pro Max orders increased, they were not enough to offset the cut in standard version orders;

    Competitive pressure: Ming-Chi Kuo believes that the iPhone 17 standard version's better-than-expected performance in the Chinese market is one of the main reasons for the sluggish demand for the Xiaomi 17 standard version;

    Market challenges: Ming-Chi Kuo pointed out that Xiaomi will face two major challenges in the Chinese high-end market in 2026:

    Continuous pressure from Apple's iPhone 17e (first half) and high-end series (second half);

    Huawei's high-end models face limited demand due to compatibility issues with "Pure HarmonyOS," but this is expected to improve in 2026.

Furthermore, he stated that if sales during the National Day holiday do not improve, Xiaomi might stimulate demand through price reductions. Looking ahead to 2026, the competitive strategy and edge AI deployment of the Xiaomi 18 series will be key to whether it can return to growth. 此外，他还表示，若十一长假销售未见改善，小米可能通过降价刺激需求。展望 2026 年，Xiaomi 18 系列的竞争策略与端侧 AI 布局将成为能否重返增长的关键。

In stark contrast, Xiaomi Group President Lu Weibing posted on Weibo yesterday afternoon, stating that "the Xiaomi 17 series is confident that its sales will be higher than the previous Xiaomi 15 series," and attributed the lower-than-expected sales of the Xiaomi 17 standard version to the temporary addition of a 1TB version. 与此形成鲜明对比的是，小米集团总裁卢伟冰昨天下午在微博发文表示，「小米17系列有信心销量会比上代小米15系列更多」，并称小米 17 标准版销量不及预期是临时增加 1TB 版本所致。

Lei Jun reposted this Weibo post with the caption "Congratulations to the phone team ❤️❤️❤️". 雷军转发了此条微博，并配文「祝贺手机团队 ❤️❤️❤️」。

item.title: 余承东被任命为华为 IRB 主任
item.guid: 余承东被任命为华为-IRB-主任
item.description:
According to Phoenix News, yesterday, Richard Yu, Huawei's Executive Director and CEO of Consumer Business Group, once again received a significant job adjustment, officially being appointed as the Director of the company's Investment Review Board (IRB). 据凤凰网报道，昨天，华为常务董事、终端 BG 董事长余承东今日再度迎来重要职务调整，正式增任公司投资评审委员会（IRB）主任。

His core mission is to lead Huawei to achieve global leadership in the field of Artificial Intelligence (AI), and he is internally regarded as the key leader for "winning the critical AI battle." 其核心任务是带领华为在人工智能（AI）领域实现全球领先，被内部视为「打赢 AI 关键战役」的核心领导人。

It is understood that the main function of the IRB is to evaluate and control resource allocation, project initiation, and budget approval for the company's major strategic directions, ensuring that strategic resources are efficiently channeled to core areas. 据悉，IRB 的主要职能是对公司重大战略方向的资源投入、项目立项及预算审批进行评估与把控，确保战略资源高效倾斜至核心领域。

This appointment document was personally signed by Huawei founder Ren Zhengfei, highlighting the top leadership's emphasis on AI strategy and their trust in Richard Yu. 此次任命文件由华为创始人任正非亲自签发，凸显最高层对 AI 战略的重视以及对余承东的信任。

item.title: 「Mac 不会感染病毒」神话正在加速破灭
item.guid: 「Mac-不会感染病毒」神话正在加速破灭
item.description:
Recently, MacPaw's cybersecurity division Moonlock released its "Mac Security Survey 2025" report, which shows that the long-standing myth of "Macs being immune to malware" is rapidly being debunked. 日前，MacPaw 网络安全部门 Moonlock 发布《Mac Security Survey 2025》调查报告，显示长期流传的「Mac 免疫恶意软件」的神话正在加速破灭。

According to the report, the survey was conducted in June 2025, covering 1,000 adult American users. All respondents were recruited through the Cint survey platform and completed the questionnaire online, with an average completion time of about 10 minutes. The statistical margin of error for the results was approximately ±3 percentage points. 据介绍，此次调查于 2025 年 6 月进行，覆盖 1,000 名美国成年用户，所有受访者均通过 Cint 调研平台招募，并以在线形式完成问卷，平均答题时长约 10 分钟，结果的统计误差约为 ±3 个百分点。

The report indicates that only 15% of macOS users still believe that Macs are not susceptible to malware infection, a significant drop from 28% in 2023. 报告指出，仅有 15% 的 macOS 用户仍然认为 Mac 不会受到恶意软件感染，而在 2023 年这一比例高达 28%。

This change reflects a gradual shift in public perception of Mac security; the past impression that "Macs are safer than Windows" is slowly collapsing in the face of frequent malware and cyberattacks. 这一变化反映了大众用户对 Mac 安全性的认知正在逐步转变，过去「Mac 比 Windows 更安全」的印象在频繁出现的恶意软件与网络攻击面前正逐渐崩塌。

The survey also showed that 66% of respondents had experienced at least one cyber threat in the past year, and 31% explicitly stated they had been affected by malware. 调查还显示，66% 的受访者在过去一年中至少遭遇过一次网络威胁，31% 明确表示曾被恶意软件波及。

Meanwhile, 72% of users are concerned that generative AI will accelerate the growth of cyber threats, while only 34% believe that AI will provide stronger security. 与此同时，72% 的用户担心生成式 AI 将加速网络威胁的增长，而仅有 34% 的人认为 AI 会带来更强的安全保障。

Moonlock emphasizes that although Apple provides built-in security tools in macOS such as the "Passwords" App and FileVault, relying solely on system protection is not enough to withstand increasingly sophisticated attacks. Moonlock 强调，尽管苹果在 macOS 中提供了「密码」App、文件保险箱等内置安全工具，但仅依赖系统防护并不足以抵御日益复杂的攻击。

The report also shows that 48% of users still reuse passwords across multiple accounts, 59% save passwords in their browsers, and 25% frequently skip system updates, behaviors that expose them to greater risk. 报告还显示，48% 的用户仍在多个账户间重复使用密码，59% 将密码保存在浏览器中，25% 经常跳过系统更新，这些行为使他们暴露在更大的风险之下。

🔗 Full report: https://moonlock.com/2025/09/Mac-Security-Survey-2025.pdf 🔗 报告全文： https://moonlock.com/2025/09/Mac-Security-Survey-2025.pdf

item.title: 微信 iOS 更新：聊天支持发送实况照片，误删对话 5 秒内可撤销
item.guid: 微信-iOS-更新：聊天支持发送实况照片，误删对话-5-秒内可撤销
item.description:
Recently, WeChat for iOS officially pushed version 8.0.61. The official WeChat account "WeChat Pai" published an article introducing two major new features brought by this update: 近日，微信 iOS 端正式推送 8.0.61 版本，微信官方在公众号「微信派」发表文章，介绍了本次更新带来的两大新特性：

Chat now supports sending Live Photos: Users can tap "Photos" in the chat box to select and send Live Photos, which include dynamic visuals and sound, consistent with "Live Photo" effects in albums. 聊天支持发送实况照片： 用户在聊天框点击「照片」即可选择实况照片发送，实况照片包含动态画面与声音，效果与相册中的「Live Photo」一致。

It is understood that this feature previously only supported scenarios like Moments and Status, but after the update, it has been extended to one-on-one and group chats. 据悉，该功能此前仅支持朋友圈、状态等场景，更新后扩展至一对一及群聊对话。

Accidentally deleted chats can be undone: When a user swipes left to delete a single friend or group chat, an "Undo" prompt will appear at the bottom of the interface. Clicking it within 5 seconds will restore the deleted conversation, preventing loss of chat history due to accidental operations. 误删对话可撤销： 当用户左滑删除单个好友或群聊对话后，界面底部会出现「撤销」提示，5 秒内点击即可恢复已删除的对话，避免因误操作导致的聊天记录丢失。

It should be noted that undo is only available for the most recent deletion operation and cannot be recovered after the timeout. 需要注意的是，撤销仅限于最近一次删除操作，超时后无法恢复。

Currently, this update has been pushed to iOS users, and can be experienced by upgrading to version 8.0.61 or higher. 目前，该更新已面向 iOS 用户推送，升级至 8.0.61 及以上版本即可体验。

item.title: F-Droid 警告 Google 新规或使第三方应用商店难以为继
item.guid: F-Droid-警告-Google-新规或使第三方应用商店难以为继
item.description:
Yesterday, open-source app store F-Droid stated in its latest announcement that Google's upcoming "developer registration regulations" could put independent Android app stores into an existential crisis. 昨天，开源应用商店 F-Droid 在最新声明中表示，谷歌即将实施的「开发者注册规定」可能会让独立安卓应用商店陷入生存危机。

According to the new regulations, all Android developers must submit personal information such as government ID, and directly report app identifiers and signing keys to Google. 根据新规，所有 Android 开发者必须提交政府身份证件等个人信息，并将应用标识符和签名密钥直接上报谷歌。

This means that even if an app is not distributed through Google Play, it must still follow Google's unified verification process. 这意味着，即便应用不是通过 Google Play 分发，也必须遵循谷歌的统一验证流程。

F-Droid pointed out that this requirement is equivalent to cutting off the operational foundation of third-party stores, as they can neither complete registration on behalf of developers nor possess developers' keys. F-Droid 指出，这一要求等于切断了第三方商店的运作基础。因为它们既无法代替开发者完成注册，也不能掌握开发者的密钥。

Once the policy is fully implemented, F-Droid will no longer be able to provide app updates or installation services to users. The team stated bluntly: "This regulation will end the operation of F-Droid and other open-source distribution channels." 一旦政策全面落地，F-Droid 将无法继续为用户提供应用更新或安装服务。该团队直言：「这项规定将终结 F-Droid 及其他开源分发渠道的运营。」

Google, on its part, emphasized that the new regulations are aimed at improving security and preventing the spread of malware. 谷歌方面则强调，新规是为了提升安全性、防止恶意软件传播。

However, F-Droid countered that Google Play itself has had multiple cases of malicious apps, and the Android system already has security mechanisms like Play Protect. In comparison, the open-source model offers higher transparency and trustworthiness. 但 F-Droid 反驳称，Google Play 本身也多次出现恶意应用案例，而安卓系统已有 Play Protect 等安全机制。相比之下，开源模式的透明度和可信度更高。

More worryingly, users may only be able to rely on official Google channels to obtain apps in the future, significantly weakening the openness of the Android ecosystem. F-Droid calls on regulatory bodies to intervene and investigate, to prevent Google from further strengthening its monopoly under the guise of "security." 更令人担忧的是，用户未来可能只能依赖谷歌官方渠道获取应用，安卓生态的开放性将被大幅削弱。F-Droid 呼吁监管机构介入调查，防止谷歌借「安全」之名进一步强化垄断。

Google plans to implement this policy in phases starting from September 2026, at which point the prospects for third-party app stores will face severe challenges. 谷歌计划自 2026 年 9 月起分阶段推行该政策，届时第三方应用商店的前景将面临严峻考验。

item.title: 特斯拉前员工被机器人打成重伤，已起诉公司索赔 5100 万美元
item.guid: 特斯拉前员工被机器人打成重伤，已起诉公司索赔-5100-万美元
item.description:
According to Manufacturing Dive, a former Tesla factory technician recently filed a lawsuit in the U.S. District Court for the Northern District of California, accusing Tesla and robot manufacturer Fanuc of negligence in safety management, leading to him being "suddenly and without warning" struck by an industrial robot arm while working at the Fremont factory in July 2023, causing him to lose consciousness on the spot. 据 Manufacturing Dive 报道，日前，一名前特斯拉工厂技术员在美国加州北区法院提起诉讼，指控特斯拉及机器人制造商 Fanuc 疏于安全管理，导致其在 2023 年 7 月于弗里蒙特工厂作业时被工业机器人手臂「突然且毫无预警」击中，当场失去意识。

The complaint states that the worker, named Peter Hinterdobler, was assisting engineers in disassembling a Fanuc industrial robot at the time. 诉状显示，该工人名为 Peter Hinterdobler，当时正协助工程师拆解一台 Fanuc 工业机器人。

The robot arm released a force equivalent to "approximately 8,000 pounds of counterweight," knocking him to the ground. The plaintiff claims to have suffered severe physical, mental, and economic damages as a result, with medical expenses totaling approximately $1 million, and is currently seeking total compensation of $51 million. 机器人手臂释放的力量相当于「约 8000 磅的平衡重」，将其击倒在地。原告称因此遭受严重身体、精神及经济损失，医疗费用已累计约 100 万美元，目前索赔总额达 5100 万美元。

The document also pointed out that the robot involved was temporarily placed in an "unspecified area," and workers interacted with it in a "reasonably foreseeable manner." 文件还指出，涉事机器人被临时安置在「非指定区域」，工人以「合理可预见的方式」与其交互。

After the accident, Tesla reportedly implemented new lifting and safety protocols for this robot model. The plaintiff also stated that the company possesses accident videos but has not provided them despite multiple requests. 事故发生后，特斯拉据称已针对该型号机器人实施新的吊装与安全规程。原告同时表示，公司掌握事故视频，但多次请求仍未获提供。

Tesla has filed a motion to dismiss, citing the "exclusive remedy provision" in California's Workers' Compensation Act as a defense. 特斯拉方面已提出驳回动议，援引加州《工人补偿法》中的「唯一救济条款」作为抗辩。

It is understood that this factory is Tesla's largest production base in California, responsible for the manufacturing of Model S, Model 3, Model X, and Model Y. 据了解，该厂区是特斯拉在加州最大的生产基地，负责 Model S、Model 3、Model X 与 Model Y 的制造。

item.title: 优必选再签 3000 万元人形机器人订单，总额逼近 4.3 亿元
item.guid: 优必选再签-3000-万元人形机器人订单，总额逼近-4.3-亿元
item.description:
Yesterday, UQI Youqi, a smart logistics subsidiary of UBTECH, signed a procurement contract with Tianqi Automation Engineering Co., Ltd. The latter will purchase Walker S series industrial humanoid robots totaling 30 million yuan, with delivery expected to be completed by December 31, 2025. 昨天，优必选智慧物流子公司 UQI 优奇与天奇自动化工程股份有限公司签订采购合同，后者将采购总价 3000 万元的 Walker S 系列工业人形机器人，预计于 2025 年 12 月 31 日前完成交付。

With this order, the cumulative contract value for UBTECH's Walker series humanoid robots has approached 430 million yuan, including nearly 50 million yuan in orders delivered in the first half of the year, and a 250 million yuan contract for embodied intelligent humanoid robots signed in September. 加上本次订单，优必选 Walker 系列人形机器人累计合同金额已接近 4.3 亿元，其中包括上半年已交付的近 5000 万元订单，以及 9 月签下的 2.5 亿元具身智能人形机器人合同。

This contract is considered the largest humanoid robot order globally to date. 该笔合同被认为是迄今全球最大的人形机器人订单。

Currently, UBTECH has collaborated with companies such as BYD, Geely Auto, FAW-Volkswagen Qingdao Branch, Audi FAW, Foxconn, and SF Express. The Walker S series has entered practical training scenarios in multiple factories, including new energy vehicle manufacturing, 3C manufacturing, and smart logistics. 目前，优必选已与比亚迪、吉利汽车、一汽-大众青岛分公司、奥迪一汽、富士康、顺丰等企业展开合作，Walker S 系列已进入新能源汽车制造、3C 制造及智慧物流等多个工厂实训场景。

The company stated that it will continue to enhance its mass production capabilities and accelerate the deployment of humanoid robots in real industrial scenarios. 公司表示将持续提升量产能力，加速推动人形机器人在真实工业场景中的落地应用。

item.title: 阿里 7 大模型霸榜 Hugging Face 全球前十，Qwen3-Omni 登顶
item.guid: 阿里-7-大模型霸榜-Hugging-Face-全球前十，Qwen3-Omni-登顶
item.description:
Recently, Hugging Face, the world's largest AI open-source community, released its latest model ranking, with 7 Alibaba Tongyi models making it into the global top ten, almost "dominating the list." Among them, the newly open-sourced all-modal large model Qwen3-Omni topped the list. 日前，全球最大 AI 开源社区 Hugging Face 公布最新一期模型榜单，阿里通义 7 款模型入选全球前十，几乎实现「屠榜」，其中刚刚开源的全模态大模型 Qwen3-Omni 登顶。

It is reported that Qwen3-Omni can process four types of data: text, images, audio, and video. Its audio and video capabilities achieved 32 open-source best performance SOTAs, while maintaining stable performance in text and image single modalities. This is the first time in the industry that such training results have been achieved. 据悉，Qwen3-Omni 可处理文本、图片、语音和视频四类数据，音视频能力斩获 32 项开源最佳性能 SOTA，同时保持文本与图像单模态性能稳定，这是业内首次实现该训练效果。

Complex instructions that previously required multiple models to complete can now be achieved solely by Qwen3-Omni, significantly enhancing the human-computer interaction experience. In the future, it is expected to be applied in scenarios such as in-car systems, smart glasses, and mobile phones. 此前需多模型协同完成的复杂指令，如今仅凭 Qwen3-Omni 即可实现，显著提升人机交互体验，未来有望应用于车载、智能眼镜、手机等场景。

At the 2025 Apsara Conference, Alibaba unveiled 7 models in one go, attracting global attention. 在 2025 云栖大会上，阿里一口气发布 7 款模型，引发全球关注。

In addition to Qwen3-Omni, six other models from the Tongyi family, including Qwen3-VL (Visual Understanding), Qwen-Image-Edit-2509 (Image Editing), Wan2.2-Animate (Action Generation), and DeepResearch (Deep Research Agent), also made it into Hugging Face's global top ten. 除 Qwen3-Omni 外，通义家族的 Qwen3-VL（视觉理解）、Qwen-Image-Edit-2509（图像编辑）、Wan2.2-Animate（动作生成）、DeepResearch（深度研究 Agent）等 6 款模型同样入选 Hugging Face 全球前十。

As of now, Alibaba Tongyi has open-sourced over 300 models, covering all modalities and sizes, with global downloads exceeding 600 million times and over 170,000 derived models, ranking first globally. 截至目前，阿里通义已开源超 300 款模型，覆盖全模态、全尺寸，全球下载量突破 6 亿次，衍生模型超过 17 万个，位居全球第一。

item.title: 前 Google 高管出任 OpenAI 韩国区负责人
item.guid: 前-Google-高管出任-OpenAI-韩国区负责人
item.description:
According to The Korea Times, OpenAI announced yesterday the appointment of Kim Kyoung-hoon, former Google Korea president, as its first head of Korea, who will be fully responsible for the operations and strategic advancement of the Seoul office. 据《韩国时报》报道，OpenAI 昨天宣布任命前 Google 韩国区总裁金京勋（Kim Kyoung-hoon）为首任韩国区负责人，将全面负责首尔办公室的运营与战略推进。

Kim Kyoung-hoon graduated with a degree in Computer Engineering from Seoul National University and holds an MBA from Duke University. He is currently a board member of the American Chamber of Commerce in Korea and has long been involved in policy cooperation for the ICT, cybersecurity, and content industries. 金京勋毕业于首尔大学计算机工程专业，并获杜克大学 MBA 学位，现任美国商会韩国分会董事会成员，长期参与 ICT、网络安全及内容产业政策合作。

It is reported that Kim Kyoung-hoon served as Google Korea president from 2021 to 2025, during which he drove advertising business growth and strengthened the local digital and AI ecosystem through developer and startup support programs. 据悉，金京勋曾于 2021 年至 2025 年担任 Google 韩国区总裁，期间推动广告业务增长，并通过开发者与初创企业支持计划强化本地数字与 AI 生态。

In his statement, he said: "I hope to combine Korea's innovative capabilities with OpenAI's technology to drive Korea to become a global AI leader." 他在声明中表示：「希望结合韩国的创新能力与 OpenAI 技术，推动韩国成为全球 AI 领导者。」

OpenAI noted that ChatGPT's weekly active users in Korea have grown more than fourfold over the past year, indicating rapidly increasing market demand. OpenAI 指出，过去一年 ChatGPT 在韩国的周活跃用户数增长超过 4 倍，显示市场需求快速上升。

Oliver Jay, head of the company's international business, said: "South Korea is one of the fastest countries in the world to adopt AI, and Kim Kyung-hoon's experience will help South Korea accelerate its AI transformation and support its goal of becoming an AI G3 powerhouse." 公司国际业务负责人 Oliver Jay 表示：「韩国是全球采用 AI 速度最快的国家之一，金京勋的经验将帮助韩国加速 AI 转型，并支持其成为 AI G3 强国的目标。」

item.title: 初代任天堂 Switch 日本销量破 3600 万台，已上市八年
item.guid: 初代任天堂-Switch-日本销量破-3600-万台，已上市八年
item.description:
According to Gamelnfinitus, the original Nintendo Switch has reached another milestone in the Japanese market. 据 Gamelnfinitus 报道，初代任天堂 Switch 在日本市场再创里程碑。

The latest statistics show that the cumulative sales of the Switch series (Standard, Lite, and OLED models) have exceeded 36 million units, reaching 36,005,504 units, making it one of the most successful gaming hardware in Japanese history. 最新统计显示，Switch 系列（标准版、Lite 版与 OLED 版）累计销量已突破 3600 万台，达到 36,005,504 台，成为日本历史上最成功的游戏硬件之一。

Meanwhile, the Switch 2, released in June this year, has sold over 2 million units in Japan, with recent weekly sales exceeding 40,000 units, significantly higher than the approximately 16,000 units of the original Switch series that is still on sale. 与此同时，今年 6 月发售的 Switch 2 已在日本卖出超过 200 万台，近期周销量更是超过 4 万台，明显高于仍在销售的初代 Switch 系列约 1.6 万台的表现。

In terms of software, retail sales of "Minecraft" on the Switch platform have exceeded 4 million copies. 软件方面，《我的世界》在 Switch 平台的零售销量已突破 400 万套。

Including platforms such as PS Vita, PS4, and Wii U, the total physical sales exceed 6 million copies; combined with digital versions, the total sales in the Japanese market are estimated to have surpassed 10 million copies, firmly ranking among the best-selling games. 若加上 PS Vita、PS4 与 Wii U 等平台，实体销量总和超过 600 万套；结合数字版，预计在日本市场的总销量已突破 1000 万套，稳居最畅销游戏行列。

Since its launch in March 2017, the Switch, with its integrated handheld and console design and rich lineup of first-party and third-party games, has sold over 150 million units worldwide, becoming Nintendo's best-selling home console to date. 自 2017 年 3 月上市以来，Switch 凭借掌机与主机一体化设计以及丰富的第一方与第三方游戏阵容，全球销量已超过 1.5 亿台，成为任天堂迄今最畅销的家用主机。

item.title: OPPO 启动手持云台相机项目，对标大疆、GoPro
item.guid: OPPO-启动手持云台相机项目，对标大疆、GoPro
item.description:
Jiemian News, citing informed sources, reported that OPPO has officially launched a project for handheld smart imaging devices, which will be led by the imaging team under the Find Product Planning Department, with Li Yang, former Find series GTM, as the head. The product is positioned to compete with action camera manufacturers such like GoPro and DJI. 界面新闻援引知情人士报道，OPPO 已正式立项手持智能影像设备，由 Find 产品规划部旗下影像团队负责，负责人为前 Find 系列 GTM 李阳。该产品定位对标 GoPro、大疆等运动相机厂商。

According to reports, vivo launched a similar product project at the end of last year, and the first model has completed mold development and is expected to be released next year. Several employees stated that they "have seen the prototype," and the project is led by Hong Yi, General Manager of Smart Terminal Products, with over 200 people participating. 据报道，vivo 已在去年底立项同类产品，首款机型已完成开模，预计明年发布。多位员工称「已见过样机」，项目由智慧终端产品总经理洪沂牵头，参与人数超过 200 人。

Handheld smart imaging devices are mainly divided into action cameras and panoramic cameras. The former is suitable for high-intensity sports scenes, while the latter can achieve 360° shooting. Currently, the action camera market is dominated by GoPro and DJI, while Insta360 holds an absolute share in the panoramic camera market. 手持智能影像设备主要分为运动相机与全景相机，前者适合高强度运动场景，后者可实现 360° 拍摄。目前运动相机市场由 GoPro、大疆主导，全景相机则由影石创新占据绝对份额。

Frost & Sullivan predicts that by 2027, global action camera shipments will reach 69.07 million units, panoramic camera shipments will reach 3.16 million units, and the overall market size will exceed 60 billion yuan. Frost & Sullivan 预测，到 2027 年全球运动相机出货量将达 6907 万台，全景相机出货量 316 万台，整体市场规模超 600 亿元。

After the news broke, Sina Tech reported that OPPO responded, confirming the information. 消息爆出后，据新浪科技报道，OPPO 回应确认了此消息。

In its reply, OPPO stated that the new product series will be based on OPPO's over 17 years of technical accumulation in mobile imaging, further expanding the mobile imaging experience and providing more possibilities for imaging creation. The new series is planned for release within 2026. 在回复中，OPPO 表示新产品系列将基于OPPO在手机影像超过 17 年的技术积累，进一步拓展移动影像的体验，为影像创作提供更多的可能性。该系列新品计划于2026年内发布。

item.title: iPad 全功能 WPS 开启内测
item.guid: iPad-全功能-WPS-开启内测
item.description:
Recently, netizens discovered that the iPad WPS PC version has started testing on TestFlight, with version number 12.9.0 Build 22444, and all slots are currently full. 近日，有网友发现 iPad WPS PC 版已在 TestFlight 开启测试，版本号为 12.9.0 Build 22444，目前名额已满。

It is reported that this test allows iPad users to directly experience "PC-level" functions, including text typesetting, presentation animations, and spreadsheet functions. Complex operations previously only available on computers can now be achieved. 据悉，本次测试让 iPad 用户可直接体验「PC 级」功能，包括文字排版、演示动画、表格函数等，以往仅在电脑端可用的复杂操作均可实现。

The official description states that the app integrates text, spreadsheets, presentations, PDFs, and cloud collaboration, positioning itself as a "PC-level productivity tool," emphasizing efficiency, stability, and personalization. 官方描述称，该应用集文字、表格、演示、PDF、云协作于一体，定位为「PC 级生产力工具」，强调高效、稳定与个性化。

Some experienced users reported that "the functions are very complete, font support is good, operation is smooth, touch is normal, and it's easier to use than the Android PC version," but also pointed out that "multi-window is not yet supported, and the small window ratio cannot be adjusted." 部分体验用户反馈「功能非常齐全，字体支持良好，运作流畅，触控正常，比安卓 PC 版更好用」，但也指出「暂不支持多窗口，小窗比例无法调整」。

item.title: 蔚来、乐道用户国庆期间可在 G318 川藏线免费换电
item.guid: 蔚来、乐道用户国庆期间可在-G318-川藏线免费换电
item.description:
Recently, NIO announced that its charging and battery swapping network has expanded to over 8,200 stations nationwide, including over 1,000 highway battery swapping stations, establishing a "9 vertical, 11 horizontal, 16 major city clusters" high-speed battery swapping network, covering 550 cities across the country. 日前，蔚来宣布其充换电网络已扩展至全国 8,200 余座站点，其中高速公路换电站超过 1,000 座，打通「9 纵 11 横 16 大城市群」高速换电网络，覆盖全国 550 座城市。

The official statement indicates that battery swapping stations currently cover over 1,200 districts and counties nationwide, with "county-to-county connectivity" achieved in Beijing, Shanghai, Macau, Jiangsu, Zhejiang, Guangdong, Tianjin, Chongqing, Hainan, and other regions. 官方表示，目前换电站已覆盖全国 1,200 余个区县，北京、上海、澳门、江苏、浙江、广东、天津、重庆、海南等地已实现「县县通」。

From Qiqihar in Heilongjiang in the north, to Sanya in Hainan in the south, and Karamay in Xinjiang in the west, 3-minute rapid battery swapping can be achieved. 最北至黑龙江齐齐哈尔，最南至海南三亚，最西至新疆克拉玛依，均可实现 3 分钟快速换电。

Additionally, Nio also announced that from today until October 12, 2025, Nio and Ledao users can enjoy free battery swap services on the G318 Sichuan-Tibet Highway. 此外，蔚来还宣布，即日起至 2025 年 10 月 12 日，蔚来与乐道用户在 G318 川藏线可享受免费换电服务。

item.title: 💡 Haivivi 创始人：IP 是 AI 玩具市场的首要购买因素
item.guid: 💡-Haivivi-创始人：IP-是-AI-玩具市场的首要购买因素
item.description:
Recently, iFanr interviewed Li Yong, founder of Haivivi (Yueran Innovation). 日前，爱范儿采访了 Haivivi（跃然创新）创始人李勇。

In the conversation, he stated: "From the perspective of the toy category, IP is indeed the top priority for users' purchasing decisions." 在对话中，他表示：「站在玩具品类的角度，IP 确实是用户购买决策的第一优先级。」

Li Yong believes that compared to functions and hardware parameters, consumers value the emotional connection with characters more. "What children buy is not just a toy, but their favorite Ultraman, Peppa Pig, or other characters." 李勇认为，相比功能和硬件参数，消费者更看重角色的情感连接。「孩子们买的不只是一个玩具，而是他们喜欢的奥特曼、小猪佩奇或其他角色。」

In this process, the role of AI technology is to enhance the interactive experience, bring characters to life, and thereby increase stickiness. 在这一过程中，AI 技术的作用是强化互动体验，让角色「活」起来，进而提升粘性。

He also emphasized that Haivivi adopts a 'IP + AI' dual-track strategy, on one hand relying on cooperation with global top IPs like Ultraman, and on the other hand incubating its own IPs. 他同时强调，Haivivi 选择「IP + AI」的双轨策略，一方面依靠与奥特曼等全球顶级 IP 的合作，另一方面孵化自有 IP。

Li Yong told iFanr that this model can build a differentiated advantage: "IP brings the entrance, AI brings retention, and only the combination of the two can allow toys to transcend cycles." 李勇告诉爱范儿，这种模式能够构建差异化优势，「IP 带来的是入口，AI 带来的是留存，两者结合才可能让玩具跨越周期。」

🔗 Related reading: Interview with Haivivi Founder Li Yong: To make AI toys 'useless,' we thought a lot | Diversity Company 08 🔗 相关阅读： 对话 Haivivi 创始人李勇：为了把 AI 玩具做得「没用」，我们思考了很多丨多样性公司 08

item.title: 爆料称苹果将在明年上半年推出 iPhone 17e 和 M5 Mac
item.guid: 爆料称苹果将在明年上半年推出-iPhone-17e-和-M5-Mac
item.description:
Bloomberg's tech editor Mark Gurman recently published an article stating that Apple is accelerating the update pace of multiple product lines, including iPhone 17e and M5 Mac . 彭博社科技主编 Mark Gurman 日前发表文章称，苹果正加快多条产品线的更新节奏，其中包括 iPhone 17e 与 M5 Mac 。

The news indicates that the 'iPhone 17e' is expected to be released in the first half of 2026, positioned as an entry-level model. 消息显示，「iPhone 17e」预计在 2026 年上半年发布，定位入门级机型。

Compared to the standard 'iPhone 17,' it will make more trade-offs in screen, performance, and features to avoid excessive overlap with the base model, thereby forming a clearer product positioning distinction. 与标准版「iPhone 17」相比，它将在屏幕、性能和功能上做出更多取舍，以避免与基础款过度重叠，从而形成更清晰的产品定位区分。

Regarding Macs, Apple is close to completing mass production preparations for the next-generation M5 chip-powered MacBook Pro and MacBook Air, codenamed J714/J716 and J813/J815 respectively. 在 Mac 方面，苹果已接近完成搭载新一代 M5 芯片 MacBook Pro 与 MacBook Air 的量产准备，代号分别为 J714/J716 和 J813/J815。

At the same time, two new external displays (codenamed J427, J527) are also in preparation and are expected to be released from the end of this year to early next year. This means the Mac product line will see a large-scale update in the coming months. 同时，两款新的外接显示器（代号 J427、J527）也在筹备中，预计将在今年底至明年初发布。这意味着 Mac 产品线将在未来数月迎来大规模更新。

The report states that in addition to iPhones and Macs, Apple also plans to launch new iPad Pro and Vision Pro models soon, and update the entry-level iPad and iPad Air in the first half of next year. AirPods Pro 3 has already been released, with some production lines moved to Vietnam. 报道称，除 iPhone 与 Mac 外，苹果还计划在近期推出新款 iPad Pro 与 Vision Pro，并在明年上半年更新入门级 iPad 与 iPad Air。AirPods Pro 3 已经上市，部分产线转移至越南。

item.title: 支持边聊边购物，ChatGPT 上线「即时结账」功能
item.guid: 支持边聊边购物，ChatGPT-上线「即时结账」功能
item.description:
OpenAI today announced the official launch of the 'Instant Checkout' feature within ChatGPT, allowing users to directly complete product search, ordering, and payment during conversations, without needing to jump to a third-party e-commerce platform. OpenAI 今日宣布在 ChatGPT 内正式上线「即时结账（Instant Checkout）」功能，用户可在对话过程中直接完成商品搜索、下单与支付，无需跳转至第三方电商平台。

According to the introduction, when users input requests such as 'ceramic housewarming gifts under $100,' ChatGPT will generate a product list, complete with images, prices, and purchase links. 据介绍，当用户输入「100 美元以内的陶瓷乔迁礼物」等需求时，ChatGPT 会生成商品清单，附带图片、价格及购买链接。

Users can complete specification selection and payment information entry within the chat interface, and pay directly via Apple Pay, Google Pay, or Link. Order confirmation, delivery details, and after-sales support are also displayed within ChatGPT. 用户可在对话界面完成规格选择、支付信息填写，并通过 Apple Pay、Google Pay 或 Link 等方式直接付款。订单确认、配送详情与售后支持同样在 ChatGPT 内展示。

The first batch of products currently integrated mainly comes from the Etsy platform, with over 1 million Shopify merchants, including Glossier and Spanx, to be added subsequently. This feature currently only supports single-item purchases and is only available to users in the United States. 目前接入的首批商品主要来自 Etsy 平台，后续包括 Glossier、Spanx 在内的超过 100 万 Shopify 商家也将陆续加入。 该功能现阶段仅支持 单件 商品购买，且仅面向美国地区用户开放。

OpenAI stated that product recommendations are based on the relevance and context of user queries, and do not support paid rankings . The platform will charge a fee from each completed order by signing agreements with merchants. OpenAI 表示，商品推荐基于用户查询的相关性与上下文， 不支持付费排名 。平台将通过与商家签订协议，从每笔成交订单中收取费用。

In addition to the shopping feature, OpenAI also simultaneously launched 'parental controls.' Parents and teenagers can achieve stronger security protection through account linking, with parents able to set sensitive content blocking, disable memory features, restrict usage times, and more. 除购物功能外，OpenAI 还同步推出「家长控制」选项。父母与青少年可通过账号关联实现更强的安全保护，家长可设置敏感内容屏蔽、关闭记忆功能、限制使用时段等。

This feature has been launched on the web version, and will soon be available on mobile. 该功能已在网页版上线，移动端将很快开放。

item.title: DeepSeek 发布新模型，API 价格大幅降低
item.guid: DeepSeek-发布新模型，API-价格大幅降低
item.description:
Yesterday, DeepSeek officially launched its experimental model "DeepSeek-V3.2-Exp". 昨天，DeepSeek 正式推出实验性模型「DeepSeek-V3.2-Exp」。

According to reports, this version introduces the "Sparse Attention" mechanism based on V3.1-Terminus, focusing on optimizing long text training and inference efficiency. 据介绍，该版本在 V3.1-Terminus 的基础上引入了「Sparse Attention」稀疏注意力机制，重点优化长文本训练与推理效率。

The official statement indicates that the App, web version, and mini-programs have all been updated to V3.2-Exp. This update brings significant API price reductions, lowering developer call costs by over 50%. 官方表示，App、网页端及小程序已同步更新至 V3.2-Exp。本次更新带来 API 大幅降价，开发者调用成本将降低 50% 以上。

It is worth noting that V3.2-Exp has completed validity verification on public evaluation sets, but still requires larger-scale testing in real-world usage scenarios. 值得注意的是，V3.2-Exp 已在公开评测集上完成有效性验证，但仍需在真实使用场景中进行更大规模测试。

For comparison purposes, the official team has temporarily retained the additional API interface for V3.1-Terminus; refer to the official documentation for invocation methods. 为方便对比，官方临时保留了 V3.1-Terminus 的额外 API 接口，调用方式可参考官方文档。

It is worth noting that, according to news from the WeChat official account "AGI Hunt", DeepSeek's new version V3.2 quietly appeared on the official HuggingFace page yesterday. 值得注意的是，据微信公众号「AGI Hunt」消息，DeepSeek 新版本 V3.2 已于昨天悄然现身 HuggingFace 官方页面。

It is reported that the model file named "v3.2-base" has started uploading, but is currently still hidden, and the page temporarily displays 404. 据悉，名为「v3.2-base」的模型文件已开始上传，但目前仍处于隐藏状态，页面暂时显示为 404。

🔗 Related reading: DeepSeek just updated again 🔗 相关阅读： 刚刚，DeepSeek 又更新了

item.title: Claude Sonnet 4.5 发布：连续工作超 30 小时，编程性能登顶业界
item.guid: Claude-Sonnet-4.5-发布：连续工作超-30-小时，编程性能登顶业界
item.description:
Anthropic officially launched its new generation large model, Claude Sonnet 4.5, which has broken records in multiple benchmark tests and is dubbed "the most competitive AI in history." Anthropic 正式推出新一代大模型 Claude Sonnet 4.5，在多项基准测试中刷新纪录，被称为「史上最卷 AI」。

According to reports, Claude Sonnet 4.5 ranked first in the SWE-bench Verified test, demonstrating top-tier real-world programming capabilities. This model can focus on work continuously for over 30 hours, far exceeding the previous 7-hour limit of Claude Opus 4 and Codex. 据介绍，Claude Sonnet 4.5 在 SWE-bench Verified 测试中成绩位列第一，展现出顶尖的真实编程能力,该模型能够连续专注工作超过 30 小时，远超此前 Claude Opus 4 和 Codex 的 7 小时上限。

In the OSWorld benchmark test, Claude Sonnet 4.5 achieved a score of 61.4%, a significant improvement compared to Sonnet 4's 42.2% four months ago. 在 OSWorld 基准测试中，Claude Sonnet 4.5 取得了 61.4% 的成绩，相比四个月前 Sonnet 4 的 42.2% 有显著提升。

Anthropic stated that the new model has significantly enhanced capabilities in building complex agents, operating computers, reasoning, and mathematics. Anthropic 表示，新版模型在构建复杂智能体、操作电脑、推理和数学等方面均有大幅增强。

In terms of safety, Claude Sonnet 4.5 is described as Anthropic's most aligned model to date, significantly reducing issues such as sycophancy, deception, and hallucinations, and achieving breakthroughs in defending against prompt injection attacks and content misjudgment. 在安全性上，Claude Sonnet 4.5 被称为 Anthropic 迄今对齐度最高的模型，显著减少了阿谀奉承、欺骗和幻觉等问题，并在防御提示注入攻击和内容误判方面取得突破。

It is worth noting that Anthropic has also launched a temporary research preview feature, "Imagine with Claude," allowing users to experience the model's software generation process in real-time. This feature will be available to Max subscribers within the next five days. 值得注意的是，Anthropic 同步推出了临时研究预览功能「Imagine with Claude」，用户可实时体验模型生成软件的过程，该功能将在未来五天内向 Max 订阅用户开放。

Anthropic co-founder Jared Kaplan revealed that a more advanced Opus model is expected to be launched later this year. Anthropic 联合创始人 Jared Kaplan 透露，更先进的 Opus 模型预计将在今年晚些时候推出。

🔗 Related reading: Claude 4.5 just released, capable of working for over 30 hours straight, the most competitive AI in history is born 🔗 相关阅读： Claude 4.5 刚刚发布，能连肝 30 多个小时，史上最卷 AI 诞生

item.title: 联想 moto 官宣 moto X70 Air
item.guid: 联想-moto-官宣-moto-X70-Air
item.description:
Lenovo moto's official Weibo today teased the new phone "moto X70 Air" with the caption "Light as Air, lighter and more AI-powered," featuring the slogan "Air with AI" in its poster, and confirming its official debut at the end of October. 联想 moto 官方微博今日预热新机「moto X70 Air」，配文「轻如 Air，更轻更有 AI」，在海报中打出「有 AI 的 Air」slogan，并确认将在 10 月底正式亮相。

According to official promotional materials and posters, the new product may feature a lightweight body and AI functions. Official details on specific configurations and pricing have not yet been announced and are expected to be gradually revealed in subsequent teasers. 根据官方宣传语和海报，新品或主打轻薄机身与 AI 功能。目前官方尚未公布具体配置与售价信息，预计将在后续预热中逐步揭晓。

item.title: 豆包推出输入法，iOS 已开启体验招募
item.guid: 豆包推出输入法，iOS-已开启体验招募
item.description:
According to AIPress, ByteDance's "Doubao Input Method" officially began recruiting users for experience testing yesterday. Currently, users can join the test and download the experience via TestFlight. 据 AIPress 报道，昨天，字节旗下的「豆包输入法」正式开启用户体验招募，目前，用户可通过 TestFlight 加入测试并下载体验。

The official statement indicates that this experience will primarily showcase two core features: 官方表示，本次体验将重点展示两大核心功能：

    "Doubao"-like voice recognition capability, supporting voice input and real-time call scenarios, with recognition accuracy continuously optimizing with use;

    Keyboard input and word association that become more accurate with use, currently only supporting 9-key and 26-key input modes.

It is worth noting that the official statement promises not to collect user typing and voice-related data during daily use, emphasizing privacy and security. 值得注意的是，官方承诺不会获取用户日常使用过程中的打字及语音相关数据，强调隐私与安全保障。

For users already accustomed to using "Doubao"'s voice input and real-time call features, this input method is expected to become a new high-frequency tool. The official team also encourages users to actively sign up for the experience to further improve product performance. 对于已经习惯使用「豆包」语音输入和实时通话功能的用户而言，这款输入法有望成为新的高频工具。官方也鼓励用户积极报名参与体验，进一步完善产品表现。

item.title: 陈希发布 ColorOS 16 阶段性爆料总结
item.guid: 陈希发布-ColorOS-16-阶段性爆料总结
item.description:
Yesterday, Chen Xi, Design Director of ColorOS, shared key phased updates for ColorOS 16 via Weibo, covering aspects such as fluidity, AI, design language, and cross-ecosystem interconnection. 昨天，ColorOS 设计总监陈希通过微博分享了 ColorOS 16 的阶段性更新要点，涵盖流畅性、AI、设计语言以及跨生态互联等方面。

Fluidity Breakthroughs 流畅性突破

    Introduction of the new "Aurora Engine," achieving Android's first seamless architecture, bringing smooth operations and orderly animations across all scenarios;

    "Tide Engine" debuts chip-level dynamic frame-tracking technology, ensuring stable fluidity under extreme heavy loads;

    Added "Starlight Compiler," pioneering cross-level fusion compilation technology, allowing mainstream models to also run smoothly and animate in parallel.

AI Capability Upgrades AI 能力升级

    Xiaobu Assistant will focus on "memory," bringing new features like one-click flash notes;

    Apps like Gallery, Notes, Recorder, and Calendar are fully revamped, with integrated upgrades for AI summarization and AI writing;

    Added practical features such as AI portrait fill light and AI vocal enhancement.

Design Language Update 设计语言更新

    The brand-new "Light Field Texture Design" debuts, with icons and interfaces showcasing delicate light and shadow effects, making the overall visual experience more crystal clear and transparent.

Cross-Ecosystem Interconnection 跨生态互联

    Extended to more accessories and PC, supporting features such as notification transfer, fluid cloud transfer, and PC mirror projection.

Chen Xi stated that ColorOS 16 will be codenamed "Pomegranate" and will maintain a monthly update rhythm. 陈希表示，ColorOS 16 将以「石榴」为代号，持续保持月度更新节奏。

Regarding the release date, ColorOS 16 will be officially launched on October 15th at the ODC25 Developer Conference. The first models to feature it will include the OPPO Find X9 series, OnePlus 15, OnePlus Ace6, and OPPO Pad 5. 发布日期方面，ColorOS 16 将于 10 月 15 日在 ODC25 开发者大会上正式发布，首发搭载的机型包括 OPPO Find X9 系列、一加 15、一加 Ace6 及 OPPO Pad 5。

item.title: 汉溪 K11 正式启幕，广州再添文化商业新地标
item.guid: 汉溪-K11-正式启幕，广州再添文化商业新地标
item.description:
Yesterday, Hanxi K11 in Panyu, Guangzhou, held its inauguration ceremony, marking the official opening of this commercial landmark that integrates art, humanities, and nature. 昨天，位于广州番禺的汉溪 K11 举行启幕仪式，标志着这一融合艺术、人文与自然的商业地标正式对外开放。

It is reported that the project, developed by K11 Group, is positioned as a new paradigm of "cultural retail," aiming to inject diverse lifestyles and creative experiences into the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area. 据悉，该项目由 K11 集团打造，定位为「文化零售」新典范，致力于为粤港澳大湾区注入多元生活方式与创意体验。

Hanxi K11 has a total construction area of approximately 130,000 square meters, bringing together over 220 brands, with more than 40% being the first stores in Guangzhou or the region. 汉溪 K11 总建筑面积约 13 万平方米，汇聚超过 220 家品牌，其中逾 40％ 为广州首店或区域首店。

The project encompasses retail, art exhibitions, green spaces, and community activities, striving to create an urban space that emphasizes both "sustainable development" and "cultural co-creation." 项目涵盖零售、艺术展览、绿色空间与社群活动，力图打造一个「可持续发展」与「文化共创」并重的城市空间。

Adrian Cheng, Founder and Chairman of K11 Group, stated at the event: "Hanxi K11 is one of our important layouts in the Greater Bay Area. We hope to connect people with cities, and art with life, through the concept of cultural retail." K11 集团创办人兼主席郑志刚在现场表示：「汉溪 K11 是我们在大湾区的重要布局之一，希望通过文化零售的理念，连接人与城市、艺术与生活。」

At the inauguration ceremony, K11 announced that it would collaborate with various art institutions and local creators to launch a series of public art exhibitions and interactive installations. The inaugural exhibition, "K11 NIGHT," debuted that evening, combining lights, music, and immersive experiences, attracting numerous citizens and tourists to visit and check in. 启幕仪式上，K11 宣布将携手多个艺术机构与本地创作者，推出一系列公共艺术展览与互动装置。首展「K11 NIGHT」已于当晚亮相，融合灯光、音乐与沉浸式体验，吸引大量市民与游客驻足打卡。

Additionally, Hanxi K11 also features the "K11 Select" lifestyle concept store, "K11 Art Mall" art retail space, and "K11 Go Green" green initiative zone, further strengthening its positioning in culture, environmental protection, and community building. 此外，汉溪 K11 还设有「K11 Select」生活方式集合店、「K11 Art Mall」艺术零售空间，以及「K11 Go Green」绿色倡议专区，进一步强化其在文化、环保与社群建设方面的定位。

K11 Group revealed that it will continue to expand its cultural retail footprint in Guangzhou and the Greater Bay Area, promoting urban renewal and the development of the creative economy. K11 集团方面透露，未来将持续在广州及大湾区拓展文化零售版图，推动城市更新与创意经济发展。

item.title: 京东天猫启动双十一
item.guid: 京东天猫启动双十一
item.description:
Yesterday, JD.com officially announced that this year's 11.11 Shopping Festival will officially kick off at 8 PM on October 9th, with the slogan "Official Direct Price Drop, as low as 10% off." 昨天，京东官方宣布，今年 11.11 购物节将于 10 月 9 日晚 8 点正式启动，并打出「官方直降 低至1 折」的 slogan。

JD.com stated that this event will continue its previous "early opening" strategy, covering all categories of goods including home appliances, digital products, and daily necessities. 京东表示，本次活动将延续往年「提前开门」的策略，覆盖家电、数码、日用百货等全品类商品。

Additionally, at yesterday's 2025 JD.com 11.11 Merchant Conference, JD.com announced ten major initiatives, including cost reduction subsidies, financial and service support, traffic incentives, AI, and training, with the goal of helping millions of merchants "save money and make money." 此外，在昨天的 2025 京东 11.11 商家大会上，京东宣布十项重磅举措，包括降本补贴、金融与服务支持、流量扶持、AI 与培训等，目标是帮助百万商家「既省钱又赚钱」。

On the same day, Tmall Supermarket held its Double 11 Merchant Conference in Hangzhou. At the conference, Tmall Supermarket announced a continued upgrade of its supply chain service capabilities, building upon its existing half-day delivery to achieve goods delivery in as fast as 4 hours through flash-sale pre-warehouses and three deliveries per day. 同日，天猫超市在杭州召开双 11 商家大会，商家大会现场，天猫超市宣布继续升级供应链服务能力，在原本半日达的基础之上，通过闪购前置仓和一日三配，实现商品最快 4 小时送达。

item.title: vivo 联动 CASETiFY，推出 X300 系列限定款手机壳
item.guid: vivo-联动-CASETiFY，推出-X300-系列限定款手机壳
item.description:
Yesterday, vivo officially announced a collaboration with CASETiFY to launch limited edition phone cases for the X300 series. 昨天，vivo 官宣与 CASETiFY 达成合作，推出 X300 系列限定款手机壳。

According to reports, this collaboration invited artist "Zhou Riyang" to create two exclusive custom works, "Candid Conversation" and "Playing Together," which are applied to CASETiFY custom magnetic-compatible, tough, drop-proof phone cases. 据介绍，此次合作邀请艺术家「周日央」创作两幅独家定制作品「侃侃而谈」与「玩在一起」，并应用于 CASETiFY 定制磁吸兼容强韧防摔手机壳。

The official statement indicates that this series of phone cases focuses on being "super fun and great for photos," and is combined with the "Waist-bending Girl" image, emphasizing a design philosophy that blends trendiness with practicality. 官方表示，该系列手机壳主打「巨好玩，巨出片」，并与「下腰女孩」形象结合，强调潮流与实用兼具的设计理念。

The vivo X300 series new product launch event is scheduled for 19:00 on October 13th, where more new products and collaboration details will be revealed. vivo X300 系列新品发布会定于 10 月 13 日 19:00 举办，届时将带来更多新品与合作细节。

item.title: BIRKENSTOCK 1774 推出全新平台「ENSEMBLE 1774」，首发三款鞋型
item.guid: BIRKENSTOCK-1774-推出全新平台「ENSEMBLE-1774」，首发三款鞋型
item.description:
BIRKENSTOCK's premium sub-brand 1774 today officially launched its new creative platform "ENSEMBLE 1774," aiming to gather pioneering design talents and co-create with the brand's creative studio. BIRKENSTOCK 旗下高端支线 1774 今日正式发布全新创意平台「ENSEMBLE 1774」，旨在集结先锋设计人才，与品牌创意工作室携手共创。

The first invited guest designer is Parisian designer Thibo Denis, who has created three exclusive shoe styles for the project, set to be released globally in early October 2025. 首位特邀客座设计师为巴黎设计师 Thibo Denis，他为该项目打造了三款独家鞋型，并将于 2025 年 10 月初全球发售。

According to reports, all three new products feature BIRKENSTOCK's iconic Blue Footbed, continuing the brand's orthopedic tradition by providing arch support and a comfortable experience. 据介绍，三款新品均搭载 BIRKENSTOCK 标志性的 Blue Footbed 深蓝鞋床，延续品牌矫形传统，提供足弓支撑与舒适体验。

The design inspiration comes from the concept of "climbing cities," combining sporty lines with color elements from the 1970s Yosemite spirit, emphasizing freedom and outdoor functionality. 设计灵感源自「攀登城市」的概念，结合运动风格线条与 20 世纪 70 年代优胜美地精神的色彩元素，强调自由与户外机能。

The three shoe styles are: 三款鞋型分别为：

    Uerzell : Slip-on mules, simple and sleek, with slender straps, available in sand, lime, and chestnut red.

    Stroedt : Low-top lace-up shoes, featuring a single strap across the upper, available in black, white, and lime.

    Goerlitz : Bold silhouette design, with double straps echoing the classic Arizona sandals, featuring a contrasting layered outsole, available in black, moss green, and mink brown.

The official statement indicates that all three shoe styles are named after the locations of BIRKENSTOCK's historic factories, paying tribute to the brand's heritage and craftsmanship. 官方表示，三款鞋型均以 BIRKENSTOCK 历史工厂所在地命名，致敬品牌传承与工艺。

The new collection will be available starting October 2, 2025, offering unisex shoe sizes from 36 to 46. Consumers can purchase them through the official WeChat mini-program and concept stores in Shanghai Zhangyuan and Chengdu Taikoo Li. 新品系列将于 2025 年 10 月 2 日起发售，提供 36 至 46 码中性鞋码，消费者可通过官方微信小程序及上海张园、成都太古里概念店选购。

item.title: 《疯狂动物城 2》内地定档 11 月 26 日上映，同步北美
item.guid: 《疯狂动物城-2》内地定档-11-月-26-日上映，同步北美
item.description:
Yesterday, "Zootopia 2" announced its release date in mainland China for November 26, simultaneous with North America. The official ultimate trailer was also released, promising to take audiences back to the bustling animal metropolis. 昨天，《疯狂动物城 2》宣布中国内地定档 11 月 26 日上映，与北美同步。官方同时发布终极预告，影片将带观众重返热闹的动物大都市。

Judy Hopps and Nick Wilde continue as the "stars," with popular characters like Gazelle, Chief Bogo, Mr. Big, Flash the sloth, and Finnick the fennec fox all returning. 兔朱迪与狐尼克继续担任「主演」，夏奇羊、豹警官、大先生、树懒闪电、耳廓狐芬尼克等人气角色悉数回归。

The film also introduces several new characters, including Gary the snake, voiced by Ke Huy Quan. As the film's release coincides with the Year of the Snake, this setting is particularly highlighted in the trailer. 影片还新增多位新角色，其中包括由关继威配音的蛇 Gary。由于影片恰逢生肖蛇年上映，预告片中也特别强调了这一设定。

In the trailer, Gary states that "no snakes have entered Zootopia for a long time" and reveals his wish to return home. The film generally continues the family-friendly road adventure style and is expected to be a popular animated work for the year-end release slot. 预告片中，Gary 表示「很久没有蛇类进入动物城了」，并透露其想要回家的心愿。影片整体延续合家欢公路冒险风格，预计将成为年底档期的热门动画作品。

item.title: 科幻悬疑剧《群星》宣布杀青
item.guid: 科幻悬疑剧《群星》宣布杀青
item.description:
The sci-fi suspense drama "Constellation" (《群星》), produced by Tencent Video and executive produced by Chen Sicheng, officially announced the wrap of filming, simultaneously releasing a wrap-up special and on-set photos. 由腾讯视频出品、陈思诚监制的科幻悬疑剧《群星》正式宣布杀青，并同步释出杀青特辑与现场照。

It is reported that the drama is adapted from writer Qiyue's novel of the same name, which won the Gold Award for Best Novel at the Chinese Nebula Awards for Science Fiction. The plot is set in the near future, revolving around a sudden supernatural attack in Jinchuan City. 据悉，该剧改编自作家七月的同名小说，原著曾获华语科幻星云奖最佳长篇小说金奖，剧情设定在近未来，围绕锦川市突发的超自然袭击展开。

Guo Yuan, played by Zhang Xincheng, and Yun Shan, a special response bureau agent played by Shang Yuxian, become embroiled in the incident, with clues pointing to the "Constellation Project" from 20 years ago. As the identities of key figures like Bai Hongyu, played by Wan Qian, are revealed, long-buried secrets gradually come to light. 张新成饰演的郭远与尚语贤饰演的特应局干员云杉卷入事件，线索指向 20 年前的「群星计划」。随着万茜饰演的白泓羽等核心人物身份揭晓，尘封往事逐渐浮出水面。

Currently, "Constellation" has entered the post-production phase. 目前，《群星》已进入后期制作阶段。

item.title: 舒淇凭自编自导电影《女孩》斩获釜山电影节首个最佳导演奖
item.guid: 舒淇凭自编自导电影《女孩》斩获釜山电影节首个最佳导演奖
item.description:
Yesterday, actress Shu Qi's self-written and self-directed feature film "The Girl" won the Best Director award in the main competition unit at the 30th Busan International Film Festival. 昨天，演员舒淇自编自导的剧情长片《女孩》在第 30 届釜山国际电影节上斩获主竞赛单元最佳导演奖。

This is the first Best Director award presented by the Busan International Film Festival since its transition to a competition format, marking a milestone for Shu Qi's directorial debut. 这是釜山电影节自转型为竞赛模式以来颁出的首个最佳导演奖，对舒淇的导演首作具有里程碑意义。

"The Girl" centers on women's family growth, drawing inspiration from Shu Qi's childhood experiences. The film was previously shortlisted for the main competition unit at the 82nd Venice Film Festival and the Focus section at the 50th Toronto International Film Festival. 《女孩》以女性家庭成长为核心，取材自舒淇童年经历，影片此前已入围第 82 届威尼斯电影节主竞赛单元、第 50 届多伦多国际电影节焦点单元。

The film tells the story of women's cross-generational growth and family reconciliation, depicting the sincere and delicate journey from girlhood to motherhood, reflecting contemporary women's struggles and pursuits between love, responsibility, and freedom. This award further confirms the film's recognition in the international film arena. 影片讲述女性跨越世代的成长与家庭和解，从少女到母亲的心路历程真挚细腻，映照当代女性在爱、责任与自由之间的挣扎与追寻。此次获奖，进一步印证了该片在国际影坛的认可度。
